data.name: The Coach Makers Arms
data.description: Genteel, stalwart venue serving local classics & weekend roast, plus craft cocktails & draught beer.

data.name: Lost Boys Pizza
data.description: A vampire-themed pizzeria near Mornington Crescent. Pay this restaurant a visit if you're a fan of 80s nostalgia, quirky pizza toppings and a touch of ridiculousness. The venue also boasts a basement absinthe bar, Croque Monsieur.

data.name: Abuelo
data.description: Organic, farm-to-table cafe fare, espresso and coffee cocktails offered in unique, cosy quarters. Meet resident pup Annie the Goldendoodle. Dogs get water on arrival.

data.name: Mercato Metropolitano
data.description: Massive, airy market offering a range of street fare from Italian to Vietnamese, plus cocktails.

data.name: 40 Dean Street
data.description: Italian staples and set menu options served in a homely dining room.
